20110113141546.000|20110113141906.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20110113141546.000|20110113141550.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110113141550.000|20110113141550.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110113141550.000|20110113141553.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110113141553.000|20110113141553.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110113141553.000|20110113141556.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110113141556.000|20110113141558.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110113141558.000|20110113141600.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110113141600.000|20110113141600.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110113141600.000|20110113141601.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110113141601.000|20110113141601.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110113141601.000|20110113141604.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110113141604.000|20110113141604.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110113141604.000|20110113141606.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110113141606.000|20110113141608.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110113141608.000|20110113141608.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110113141608.000|20110113141609.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110113141609.000|20110113141609.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110113141609.000|20110113141612.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110113141612.000|20110113141612.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110113141612.000|20110113141615.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110113141615.000|20110113141615.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110113141615.000|20110113141618.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110113141618.000|20110113141618.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110113141618.000|20110113141619.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110113141619.000|20110113141619.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110113141619.000|20110113141621.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110113141621.000|20110113141622.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110113141622.000|20110113141622.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110113141622.000|20110113141625.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110113141625.000|20110113141625.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110113141625.000|20110113141626.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110113141626.000|20110113141628.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110113141628.000|20110113141628.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110113141628.000|20110113141630.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110113141630.000|20110113141630.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110113141630.000|20110113141632.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110113141632.000|20110113141632.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110113141632.000|20110113141634.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110113141634.000|20110113141636.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110113141636.000|20110113141636.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110113141636.000|20110113141638.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110113141638.000|20110113141638.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110113141638.000|20110113141641.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110113141641.000|20110113141641.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110113141641.000|20110113141643.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110113141643.000|20110113141643.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110113141643.000|20110113141644.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110113141644.000|20110113141644.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110113141644.000|20110113141647.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110113141647.000|20110113141647.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110113141647.000|20110113141649.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110113141649.000|20110113141651.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110113141651.000|20110113141653.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110113141653.000|20110113141653.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110113141653.000|20110113141655.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110113141655.000|20110113141655.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110113141655.000|20110113141658.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110113141658.000|20110113141658.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110113141658.000|20110113141701.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.

20110113143414.000|20110113143416.000|CC1|>> WELL, OF COURSE, PART OF IT I
20110113143416.000|20110113143418.000|CC1|THINK THE FACT THAT CONGRESS DID
20110113143418.000|20110113143419.000|CC1|CHANGE THE LAW TO MAKE IT A     
20110113143419.000|20110113143420.000|CC1|SENATE CONFIRMED POSITION.      
20110113143420.000|20110113143422.000|CC1|THIS HAPPENED AFTER THE ATF WAS 
20110113143422.000|20110113143423.000|CC1|MOVED FROM THE TREASURY         
20110113143423.000|20110113143426.000|CC1|DEPARTMENT INTO JUSTICE, BUT    
20110113143426.000|20110113143426.000|CC1|ANOTHER THING THAT SURPRISED ME 
20110113143426.000|20110113143428.000|CC1|IN ASKING WHY THE ADMINISTRATION
20110113143428.000|20110113143430.000|CC1|TOOK THEM 23 MONTHS INTO THE    
20110113143430.000|20110113143432.000|CC1|OBAMA ADMINISTRATION TO GET A   
20110113143432.000|20110113143434.000|CC1|NOMINEE, AFTER THEY HAD ALREADY 
20110113143434.000|20110113143437.000|CC1|NOMINATED SOMEBODY TO RUN DEA   
20110113143437.000|20110113143439.000|CC1|AND THE MARSHAL SERVICE AND THE 
20110113143439.000|20110113143441.000|CC1|ANSWER I GOT WAS A SURPRISING   
20110113143441.000|20110113143441.000|CC1|ONE.                            
20110113143441.000|20110113143442.000|CC1|NUMBER ONE, MANY PEOPLE DIDN'T  
20110113143442.000|20110113143444.000|CC1|WANT TO TAKE THE JOB BECAUSE    
20110113143444.000|20110113143448.000|CC1|THEY FEARED A LONG AND TORTUROUS
20110113143448.000|20110113143450.000|CC1|CONFIRMATION PROCESS AND I WAS  
20110113143450.000|20110113143452.000|CC1|ACTUALLY TOLD SOME CONSIDERED   
20110113143452.000|20110113143454.000|CC1|THE ATF POSITION NOT TO BE A    
20110113143454.000|20110113143456.000|CC1|GOOD ONE FOR THE RESUME BECAUSE 
20110113143456.000|20110113143459.000|CC1|ATF IS CONSTANTLY IN DANGER OF  
20110113143459.000|20110113143500.000|CC1|HAVING ITS JURISDICTION AND     
20110113143500.000|20110113143502.000|CC1|BUDGET CUT BACK AND WHAT REALLY 
20110113143502.000|20110113143503.000|CC1|HAS BEEN FOR YEARS A WAR WITH   
20110113143503.000|20110113143504.000|CC1|THE NATIONAL RIFLE ASSOCIATION. 
20110113143504.000|20110113143509.000|CC1|THE NRA BELIEVE THAT ATF AGENTS 
20110113143509.000|20110113143511.000|CC1|OVERENFORCE THE LAW AND HARASS  
20110113143511.000|20110113143514.000|CC1|LEGITIMATE GUN DEALERS AND ATF  
20110113143514.000|20110113143516.000|CC1|FACES A POSSIBLE 15% BUDGET CUT 
20110113143516.000|20110113143518.000|CC1|NEXT YEAR, AND THAT IS VERY     
20110113143518.000|20110113143521.000|CC1|DIFFICULT FOR AN AGENCY TO      
20110113143521.000|20110113143521.000|CC1|ABSORB.                         
20110113143521.000|20110113143523.000|CC1|SO WITHOUT DOUBT THERE ARE STILL
20110113143523.000|20110113143524.000|CC1|AGENTS OUT THERE DOING GREAT    
20110113143524.000|20110113143525.000|CC1|WORK.                           
20110113143525.000|20110113143525.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20110113143525.000|20110113143527.000|CC1|>> BUT IT IS -- IT IS A BIT OF A
20110113143527.000|20110113143529.000|CC1|MORALE ISSUE FOR MANY PEOPLE    
20110113143529.000|20110113143530.000|CC1|THAT THEY STILL DON'T HAVE AN   
20110113143530.000|20110113143531.000|CC1|ACTING DIRECTOR.                
20110113143531.000|20110113143534.000|CC1|NOW THERE WAS ONE NOMINATED IN  
20110113143534.000|20110113143536.000|CC1|NOVEMBER, ANDREW TRAVER, A

20110113143545.000|20110113143547.000|CC1|THE ADMINISTRATION SENDS HIM    
20110113143547.000|20110113143547.000|CC1|BACK.

20110113143548.000|20110113143549.000|CC1|TALK ABOUT ATF HERE AND THEY DID

20110113144008.000|20110113144011.000|CC1|DIDN'T BLAME HER FOR WHAT TOOK  
20110113144011.000|20110113144011.000|CC1|PLACE.

20110113144045.000|20110113144046.000|CC1|IT'S BECAUSE OF WHAT YOU DID.

20110113144050.000|20110113144052.000|CC1|DOING WAS SIMPLY -- SHE ISOLATED
20110113144052.000|20110113144055.000|CC1|HERSELF AND ONLY SAW AND ONLY
